name: Akiba's Trip: Undead & Undressed - Kati Route
summary:
This set contains the all-new Kati's Route.

Experience the “true ending” of AKIBA'S TRIP: Undead & Undressed for the very first time. When a mysterious and malevolent force slumbering inside lovable Finnish maid Kati awakens, will you be able to do whatever it takes to save her?

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: 『AKIBA'S TRIP2』カティルート制作決定！
